page.title: 18The Chocolate Factory
page.content: The only industry, besides farming, in this area is a small chocolate factory on the outskirts of Rangemore village. It has been in operation for only{18 months.}The building was once a tank house for watering the greenhouses of Rangemore Hall. Now it has been converted and two men produce {Crown Royale Chocolates.} Half a ton of special Belgian chocolate is filled with unsalted sweet cream butter made into 18 different flavours. The most popular are strawberry, apricot, coffee, rum, praline, butterscotch and lemon. The chocolates are sold in the largest{department stores}and are {exported}to many parts of the world including Japan, Canada, India and America. They also specialise in{unusual {designs}and shapes on request.
